comment: Had this professor for 1101 and 1102 and he is the most coolest teacher. Would recommend this professor to take.

This class was a breeze. Majority of the class is reading articles or listening to podcasts and writing a short journal prompt. There is one major essay and a group project based off of one of the articles. Overall he makes the class fun and interactive.

LOVE HIM! He is the best English professor I've had in a while. He loves what he teaches and makes sure to help you in anyway he can. There is one group project that's worth 10% of your grade, but everything else is on you. If you have any issues with anything he will help you! Always makes class interesting, and I always leave knowing more.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Graded by few things

comment: Great teacher! Helps in every way he can and is very interactive with students. As long as you go to class and do assignments you will get a good grade.

Mr Jason Christian is one of my all-time favorite English teachers/professors, all the grades he gives are generously graded, and actually cares for his students to learn how to write and improve their writing. Tests are written papers or portions of your research paper. Also likes talking about history or current events which is fun. (1102)

This is one of the best professors I've met. He cares, and he will help you even if you try in his class. This class humbled me and helped me write better and understand English. I highly recommend it. I wanted to take him during the spring semester, but all the slots were filled.

Professor Christian truly cares about his students. He wants you to learn and he wants you to enjoy learning. Any time you need to email him he is available and wants you to help. I have never enjoyed an English Class before and I adored taking his class. This class is as interactive as you want it to be. I would highly recommend him to all.
No tests, No final, No mid-term. Three Essays, and short weekly assignments. He cares about his students. He offers help. He the goat fr.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Does not want you to fail at all and it shows in his classes. Attendance isn't technically mandatory but sometimes there will be an in-class assignment you can't make up. A few discussions throughout the semester and 3 essays which he gives you tons of help with and allows for revisions. I'd absolutely recommend taking his class.
Professor Christian was my favorite. He cares for his students and wants them to learn better. I never thought I would love an English class this much.

Great professor who wanted to help. Likes class participation. Some readings for HW but nothing hard, Does have discussion posts due for a grade at the end of class so participation is basically mandatory.
